=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Chasing Dreams Review Date: 2008/12/03 Store: Sean Roche & Therese Conte (Director) Rated: PG Format: VHS Tape Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories Product Description: ["When Gavin is faced with the decision to stay with the family farm or take a crack at a career in baseball, he is fueled by his older brother's success and cheers of his invalid brother to wind up and take a swing."] Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Director': 'Sean Roche & Therese Conte', 'Run time': '96 minutes', 'Date First Available': 'September 21, 2004', 'Actors': 'David G. Brown, John Fife, Jim Shane, Lisa Kingston, Kevin Costner', 'Studio': 'Prism/IRC'} Review Text: I buy all of Kevin's movies, so this one was a must buy, seeing as he is on the cover. I watched it, he is on two scenes MAX. They just have him on a cover to help sell the movie. I barely remember anything from this movie, so unless you're a fan of the kid in the movie, I wouldn't get it for Kevin Costner. Review Title: Nothing memorable Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Just My Luck Review Date: 2013/05/30 Categories: Comedy, Fantasy, Cerebral, Fantastic Product Description: ["Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his."] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Donald Petrie'], 'Producers': ['Arnold Rifkin', 'Bruce Willis', 'Arnon Milchan'], 'Starring': ['Lindsay Lohan', 'Chris Pine', 'Samaire Armstrong']} Review Text: Second time I have seen this. It's predictable to some degree but cute if you like Chris or Lindsay. I've always been a fan of her as an actress and musician. Chris is just adorable and does well with Lindsay in this. Worth a rent. Shilton', 'James Whitmore Jr.', 'Jeff Melman', 'Jefferson Kibbee', 'Les Landau', 'Michael Lange', 'Paul Schneider', 'Richard Lang'], 'Producers': ['Aaron Spelling', 'E. Duke Vincent', 'Darren Star'], 'Starring': ['Jason Priestley', 'Shannon Doherty', 'Jennie Garth'], 'Studio': ['CBS']} Review Text: Last Brenda season. Good steve plots. Glad I got to stream it. Review Title: season 4 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Real Housewives of Orange County: Season 1 Review Date: 2014/11/28 Store: Jeana Tomasino (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles Product Description: ['Desperate for more housewife drama? Then get ready for addictive, indulgent fun with Season One of Bravo\'s hit sensation, The Real Housewives of Orange County! Join five real-life ladies of leisure—Jo, Jeana, Lauri, Vicki and Kimberly—for an all-access pass inside their exclusive planned community. Whether they\'re sharing cocktails, shopping trips, travel plans or Botox treatments, these stylish women espose the realities of living in Southern California luxury! Available on DVD for the first time, this must-own 2-disc set includes every revealing episode from the first season, plus the can\'t-miss reunion special. For the best guilty pleasure entertainment around, take home this sensation that the New York Daily News calls "utterly" addictive.'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Television, DVD Movie, Television/Reality Shows, Blu-ray Movie', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Jeana Tomasino', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), Unqualified', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MOV-REALHWORANG', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '5 hours and 3 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 4, 2007', 'Actors': 'Jeana Tomasino', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: I wish this show was available on Prime Instant but it's not so I bought the dvd (cheaper than 1.99 pay per view).
RHOC is the only version I watch. It was great to see the beginning again. Review Title: It was great to see the beginning again Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Good Fortune Review Date: 2017/12/13 Store: John Paul DeJoria (Actor), Dan Aykroyd (Actor), Josh Tickell (Director), Rebecca Harrell Tickell (Director) & 1 more Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary Product Description: ["'Success unshared is failure.'GOOD FORTUNE is the rags to riches tale of conscious capitalism pioneer John Paul DeJoria. The son of Greek immigrants, born into humble beginnings in East Los Angeles, John Paul DeJoria has built a life full of good fortune and achieved vast wealth through a variety of businesses, among them John Paul Mitchell Hair Care Systems and Patron Tequila.In 1980, he partnered with Paul Mitchell to start a line of professional hair care products. They turned a $700 investment and 3 products into a wildly successful venture that today is worth more than $800 million. Proving his success wasn't just a fluke, John Paul then created the largest and the most recognizable tequila brand in the world - Patron.GOOD FORTUNE focuses on DeJoria's inspiring success story as well as his philanthropy. It's the true tale of a man who overcame obstacles and dedicates his life to giving back to those less fortunate. He ran through his early adulthood in and out of motorcycle gangs and today John Paul's quest is finding innovative ways to share his sizable fortune. DeJoria spends his life creating back-to-work programs for the homeless, fighting whale poachers in the Arctic and working on over 100 other philanthropic ventures. Along with Bill Gates and Warren Buffet DeJoria signed 'The Giving Pledge,' a formal promise to continue to contribute more than half of their wealth to philanthropy or charitable causes during their lifetime or in their will.Dan Aykroyd narrates the film spinning colorful stories with humor and wit. GOOD FORTUNE is an incredibly powerful and noble narrative that gives an informative and entertaining picture of this self-made billionaire and verifiable poster boy of the American dream."] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Special Interests', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'John Paul DeJoria, Josh Tickell, Dan Aykroyd, Arianna Huffington, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Rebecca Harrell TickellJohn Paul DeJoria, Josh Tickell, Dan Aykroyd, Arianna Huffington, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Rebecca Harrell Tickell See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 26 minutes', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Director': 'Josh Tickell, Rebecca Harrell Tickell', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 14, 2017', 'Actors': 'John Paul DeJoria, Dan Aykroyd, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Arianna Huffington', 'Studio': 'Audio Fidelity', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I heard about this dvd on The Garry Meier podcast out of Chicago. The price was fair on amazon so I immediately jumped on buying a copy. I did not know much about John Paul DeJoria except he was with Paul Mitchell Hair. This dvd is well edited and very entertaining. It's about an hour, maybe a little over. John Paul's life of "rags to riches" and ending up a philanthropic billionaire with a heart of gold was so heart warming to see. I shared this with several people who enjoyed it as well. Review Title: Heart warming ! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dynasty Review Date: 2017/12/13 Categories: Drama, Romance Product Description: ["The 9th and final season of the primetime soap begins as Alexis is comforted by Dex's solace and friendship and the two renew their passionate love for each other. Fallon slips out of Jeff's room after Sammy Jo shows up unexpectedly to accept his marriage offer. Blake is devastated by his fear that Krystle's disappearance at the end of season 8 may by a severe mental disorder."] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Irving J. Moore', 'Don Medford'], 'Starring': ['Joan Collins', 'Linda Evans', 'John Forsythe']} Review Text: Definitely not as good as previous seasons. I was not as engaged as I had been. Krystle played by Linda Evans departs the show which didn't help. Same with Steven. Review Title: Definitely not as good as previous seasons Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: So Undercover Review Date: 2017/12/18 Store: Miley Cyrus (Actor), Jeremy Piven (Actor), Tom Vaughan (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ['A tough, street-smart private eye is hired by the FBI to go undercover in a college sorority.'] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Tom Vaughan, Kelly Osbourne, Joshua Bowman, Miley Cyrus, Jeremy Piven', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FLKP14009DVD', 'Director': 'Tom Vaughan', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 5, 2013', 'Actors': 'Miley Cyrus, Jeremy Piven, Joshua Bowman, Kelly Osbourne', 'Studio': 'Alchemy / Millennium', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I enjoy this movie for Jeremy Piven and having family ties to New Orleans/Tulane University. This movie stars Miley Cyrus who goes undercover as a student joining a sorority. It's a similar premise to Miss Congeniality. It's predictable and geared towards teens/college age IMO. Well cast and worth checking out for Miley or Jeremy or New Orleans. The third male lead, I forget his name, he was in the TV show Revenge. Review Title: Entertaining Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/06/22 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Taylor Sheridan'], 'Producers': ['Kevin Costner', 'David Glasser', 'Art Linson'], 'Starring': ['Kevin Costner', 'Luke Grimes', 'Kelly Reilly'], 'Studio': ['PARAMOUNTTV']} Review Text: Beautiful scenery. I'm excited to see where the rest off this series goes. Kevin Costner is a perfect older cowboy!! Not FYI not PG /family appropriate. High amount of F word and a somewhat gratuitous sex scene. I'm not a fan of the daughter, too harsh and vulgar.
I watched this on Amazon. No issues. Review Title: Kevin Costner is the best!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/10/15 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Steinberg'], 'Producers': ['Robinne Lee', 'Eric Hayes', 'Keetgi Kogan', 'M. Elizabeth Hughes'], 'Starring': ['Robinne Lee', 'Dule Hill', 'Gabrielle Union'], 'Studio': ['Viacom']} Review Text: I've been watching Psych on Amazon so I saw this pop up with Dule Hill and thought I would check it out to see how he was in a different format. He was much the same in this as he is on Psych. Also I kept expecting him to be the love interest but no it's Joel from Parenthood played by Sam Jaeger. Dule has a short scene and he shares a large part of the movie cover and Sam who is second most scenes is not even on the cover. Gabrielle Union is well known and also on he cover as is the cheating boyfriend in this movie. I am glad to see I am not the only one who noticed and commented on this misleading picture!!
I did enjoy this movie a lot more than I expected. Sam Jaeger is the best part of this movie and kept me watching until the end. Review Title: better than expected Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Destination Wedding [DVD] Review Date: 2022/01/06 Store: Winona Ryder (Actor), Keanu Reeves (Actor), Victor Levin (Director, Writer) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ["The smart, witty, intimate modern romance Destination Wedding reunites two of cinema's most adored stars, Keanu Reeves and Winona Ryder, as the socially awkward Frank and Lindsay. When they meet on the way to a destination wedding, they soon discover they have a lot in common: they both hate the bride, the groom, the wedding, themselves, and most especially each other. As the weekend's events continually force them together—and their cheerlessness immediately isolates them from the other guests—Frank and Lindsay find that if you verbally spar with someone long enough, anything can happen. When debate gives way to desire, they must decide which is stronger: their hearts or their common sense.", ']]>'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Drama/Love & Romance, Comedy, Art House & International', 'Format': 'DVD, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Robert Jones, Elizabeth Dell, Gail Lyon, Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder, Victor Levin', 'Initial release date': '2018-11-06', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.39:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'Victor Levin', 'Media Format': 'DVD, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 27 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 6, 2018', 'Actors': 'Winona Ryder, Keanu Reeves', 'Producers': 'Gail Lyon, Elizabeth Dell, Robert Jones', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Victor Levin', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: the banter between wynona and keanu is just fabulous !! Review Title: love this movie Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Chasing Dreams Review Date: 2008/12/03 Store: Sean Roche & Therese Conte (Director) Rated: PG Format: VHS Tape Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories Product Description: ["When Gavin is faced with the decision to stay with the family farm or take a crack at a career in baseball, he is fueled by his older brother's success and cheers of his invalid brother to wind up and take a swing."] Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Director': 'Sean Roche & Therese Conte', 'Run time': '96 minutes', 'Date First Available': 'September 21, 2004', 'Actors': 'David G. I watched it, he is on two scenes MAX. They just have him on a cover to help sell the movie. I barely remember anything from this movie, so unless you're a fan of the kid in the movie, I wouldn't get it for Kevin Costner. Review Title: season 4 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Real Housewives of Orange County: Season 1 Review Date: 2014/11/28 Store: Jeana Tomasino (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles Product Description: ['Desperate for more housewife drama? Review Title: It was great to see the beginning again Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Good Fortune Review Date: 2017/12/13 Store: John Paul DeJoria (Actor), Dan Aykroyd (Actor), Josh Tickell (Director), Rebecca Harrell Tickell (Director) & 1 more Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary Product Description: ["'Success unshared is failure.'GOOD FORTUNE is the rags to riches tale of conscious capitalism pioneer John Paul DeJoria. The son of Greek immigrants, born into humble beginnings in East Los Angeles, John Paul DeJoria has built a life full of good fortune and achieved vast wealth through a variety of businesses, among them John Paul Mitchell Hair Care Systems and Patron Tequila.In 1980, he partnered with Paul Mitchell to start a line of professional hair care products. They turned a $700 investment and 3 products into a wildly successful venture that today is worth more than $800 million. Proving his success wasn't just a fluke, John Paul then created the largest and the most recognizable tequila brand in the world - Patron.GOOD FORTUNE focuses on DeJoria's inspiring success story as well as his philanthropy. It's the true tale of a man who overcame obstacles and dedicates his life to giving back to those less fortunate. He ran through his early adulthood in and out of motorcycle gangs and today John Paul's quest is finding innovative ways to share his sizable fortune. DeJoria spends his life creating back-to-work programs for the homeless, fighting whale poachers in the Arctic and working on over 100 other philanthropic ventures. Along with Bill Gates and Warren Buffet DeJoria signed 'The Giving Pledge,' a formal promise to continue to contribute more than half of their wealth to philanthropy or charitable causes during their lifetime or in their will.Dan Aykroyd narrates the film spinning colorful stories with humor and wit. GOOD FORTUNE is an incredibly powerful and noble narrative that gives an informative and entertaining picture of this self-made billionaire and verifiable poster boy of the American dream."] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Special Interests', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'John Paul DeJoria, Josh Tickell, Dan Aykroyd, Arianna Huffington, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Rebecca Harrell TickellJohn Paul DeJoria, Josh Tickell, Dan Aykroyd, Arianna Huffington, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Rebecca Harrell Tickell See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 26 minutes', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Director': 'Josh Tickell, Rebecca Harrell Tickell', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 26 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 14, 2017', 'Actors': 'John Paul DeJoria, Dan Aykroyd, Danny Trejo, Cheech Marin, Arianna Huffington', 'Studio': 'Audio Fidelity', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I heard about this dvd on The Garry Meier podcast out of Chicago. The price was fair on amazon so I immediately jumped on buying a copy. I did not know much about John Paul DeJoria except he was with Paul Mitchell Hair. This dvd is well edited and very entertaining. It's about an hour, maybe a little over. John Paul's life of "rags to riches" and ending up a philanthropic billionaire with a heart of gold was so heart warming to see. I shared this with several people who enjoyed it as well. Review Title: Heart warming ! Review Title: Definitely not as good as previous seasons Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: So Undercover Review Date: 2017/12/18 Store: Miley Cyrus (Actor), Jeremy Piven (Actor), Tom Vaughan (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ['A tough, street-smart private eye is hired by the FBI to go undercover in a college sorority.'] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Tom Vaughan, Kelly Osbourne, Joshua Bowman, Miley Cyrus, Jeremy Piven', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FLKP14009DVD', 'Director': 'Tom Vaughan', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'February 5, 2013', 'Actors': 'Miley Cyrus, Jeremy Piven, Joshua Bowman, Kelly Osbourne', 'Studio': 'Alchemy / Millennium', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I enjoy this movie for Jeremy Piven and having family ties to New Orleans/Tulane University. This movie stars Miley Cyrus who goes undercover as a student joining a sorority. It's a similar premise to Miss Congeniality. It's predictable and geared towards teens/college age IMO. Well cast and worth checking out for Miley or Jeremy or New Orleans. The third male lead, I forget his name, he was in the TV show Revenge. Review Title: Entertaining Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/06/22 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Taylor Sheridan'], 'Producers': ['Kevin Costner', 'David Glasser', 'Art Linson'], 'Starring': ['Kevin Costner', 'Luke Grimes', 'Kelly Reilly'], 'Studio': ['PARAMOUNTTV']} Review Text: Beautiful scenery. I'm excited to see where the rest off this series goes. Kevin Costner is a perfect older cowboy!! Not FYI not PG /family appropriate. High amount of F word and a somewhat gratuitous sex scene. I'm not a fan of the daughter, too harsh and vulgar.
I watched this on Amazon. No issues. Review Title: Kevin Costner is the best!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/10/15 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Steinberg'], 'Producers': ['Robinne Lee', 'Eric Hayes', 'Keetgi Kogan', 'M. Elizabeth Hughes'], 'Starring': ['Robinne Lee', 'Dule Hill', 'Gabrielle Union'], 'Studio': ['Viacom']} Review Text: I've been watching Psych on Amazon so I saw this pop up with Dule Hill and thought I would check it out to see how he was in a different format. He was much the same in this as he is on Psych. Also I kept expecting him to be the love interest but no it's Joel from Parenthood played by Sam Jaeger. Dule has a short scene and he shares a large part of the movie cover and Sam who is second most scenes is not even on the cover. Gabrielle Union is well known and also on he cover as is the cheating boyfriend in this movie. I am glad to see I am not the only one who noticed and commented on this misleading picture!!
I did enjoy this movie a lot more than I expected. Sam Jaeger is the best part of this movie and kept me watching until the end. Review Title: better than expected Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Destination Wedding [DVD] Review Date: 2022/01/06 Store: Winona Ryder (Actor), Keanu Reeves (Actor), Victor Levin (Director, Writer) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ["The smart, witty, intimate modern romance Destination Wedding reunites two of cinema's most adored stars, Keanu Reeves and Winona Ryder, as the socially awkward Frank and Lindsay. When they meet on the way to a destination wedding, they soon discover they have a lot in common: they both hate the bride, the groom, the wedding, themselves, and most especially each other. As the weekend's events continually force them together—and their cheerlessness immediately isolates them from the other guests—Frank and Lindsay find that if you verbally spar with someone long enough, anything can happen. When debate gives way to desire, they must decide which is stronger: their hearts or their common sense.", ']]>'] Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Drama/Love & Romance, Comedy, Art House & International', 'Format': 'DVD, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Robert Jones, Elizabeth Dell, Gail Lyon, Keanu Reeves, Winona Ryder, Victor Levin', 'Initial release date': '2018-11-06', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.39:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'Victor Levin', 'Media Format': 'DVD, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 27 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 6, 2018', 'Actors': 'Winona Ryder, Keanu Reeves', 'Producers': 'Gail Lyon, Elizabeth Dell, Robert Jones', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Victor Levin', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: the banter between wynona and keanu is just fabulous !! SUMMARY:  
The individual displays a clear preference for movies that blend humor and sentimentality, as indicated by consistently high ratings for comedies and romantic genres. A notable pattern emerges in their ratings, where films featuring prominent actors—especially those they are fans of—receive favorable reviews, while misleading marketing results in disappointment. 

The person leans towards nostalgic content, often engaging with established franchises and reality TV that reflects luxury lifestyles. Their purchase history suggests they appreciate quality productions, favoring those with engaging scripts and strong character development, although they are sensitive to misleading promotional tactics, impacting their overall satisfaction.

Price-wise, the buyer appears budget-conscious, choosing DVDs over pricier streaming options, hinting at a practical mindset. Nevertheless, they resonate with inspirational narratives, particularly those showcasing personal triumphs and philanthropy. 

Overall, the core preferences reflect a mix of loyalty to favorite actors, an affinity for comedic and heartwarming storytelling, and a tendency towards nostalgia for classic TV series and films. Their viewing choices suggest an appreciation for well-crafted entertainment that combines humor with meaningful life lessons.

target_interaction.text: discs work fine so far. i noticed that there are scratches on some of the discs so i am assuming this set was used and repackaged as new [would explain why the complete series was 35 dollars] . ive only used first 2 seasons and have not had much issue yet with play. also one complaint is how the discs are set in the case piled . could be worse i guess ?? just fyi!
